title: POS and CMS - Optik Melawai
description: Optik Melawai needs a new system to replace the old system which has been used in operations both from the branch and HO side.
short_description: CMS and POS used for operational processes that occur at Optik Melawai

goals.description: The background to the implementation of the New POS Project aims to rejuvenate the POS system owned by Optik Melawai Group and RRG, which previously was still a desktop application, into a web application. This rejuvenation aims to make the system more integrated and easier to manage via the internet network by every employee on duty either at the branch or at the HO.
